HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to convert the image to base64 in simple steps.
steps: 1. Upload the desired image file or Click on the drop-down arrow and select dropbox/Google Drive
2. Adjust the size and style of the image by using the options available.
3. Adjust the desired orientation of the image.
4. Punch the save option to save the changes made.
5. Download the converted image by punching the download option.
6. Hurray!!! The converted image to base64 is ready to rock.
